abstract: Pres Obama announces $215 million biomedical research initiative that aims at discovering genetic causes of disease and developing new drugs tailored to characteristics of individual patients.
lead_paragraph: President Obama announced a biomedical research initiative, including plans to collect data on one million Americans in order to tailor treatments to individual patients.
snippet: President Obama announced a biomedical research initiative, including plans to collect data on one million Americans in order to tailor treatments to individual patients.

headline.main: U.S. to Collect Genetic Data to Hone Care
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Collect Genetic Data to Hone Care
